name: (No style)
negative_prompt: longbody, lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality

name: Minimalist
prompt: minimalist {prompt} . simple, clean, uncluttered, elegant, modern, sleek, sophisticated, refined, focused, understated

name: Baroque
prompt: baroque {prompt} . elaborate, decorative, grand, detailed, luxurious, dramatic, intricate, rich, ornate

name: Pop Art
prompt: pop art {prompt} . bold, vibrant, colorful, playful, modern, graphic, stylized, high-energy, comic-style

name: Art Deco
prompt: art deco {prompt} . elegant, glamorous, geometric, symmetrical, sophisticated, metallic, sleek, 1920s, 1930s

name: Impressionism
prompt: impressionism {prompt} . painterly, soft, atmospheric, colorful, vibrant, brushstrokes, light, serene, dreamlike

name: Futuristic
prompt: futuristic {prompt} . sleek, high-tech, advanced, cutting-edge, innovative, modern, sci-fi, streamlined, bold

name: Bohemian
prompt: bohemian {prompt} . eclectic, colorful, artistic, free-spirited, laid-back, cozy, natural, vibrant, creative

name: Retro
prompt: retro {prompt} . nostalgic, vintage, old-school, 80s, 70s, vibrant, bold, colorful, iconic

name: Watercolor
prompt: watercolor {prompt} . soft, delicate, fluid, translucent, light, painterly, ethereal, subtle, airy

name: Abstract Expressionism
prompt: abstract expressionism {prompt} . expressive, bold, dynamic, non-representational, colorful, chaotic, energetic, raw, artistic
